201202.n: Major Issues in the Euro-Mediterranean Area

201302.n: Major Issues in the Euro-Mediterranean Area

201402.n: Major Issues in the Euro-Mediterranean Area

catList: The course aims to provide a comprehensive analysis of the major issues in the Euro-Mediterrranean Area. It will investigate the main political, economic and social dynamics in the region. Given the importance of this region for the European integration and European security, the topics covered will enable the students to grasp the many complexities in the Euro-Mediterranean.
